colour.recovery.dataset.smits1999 Module¶

Smits (1999) - Reflectance Recovery Dataset¶

Defines the dataset for reflectance recovery using Smits (1999) method.

References

[1]Smits, B. (1999). An RGB-to-Spectrum Conversion for Reflectances. Journal of Graphics Tools, 4(4), 11–22. doi:10.1080/10867651.1999.10487511
colour.recovery.dataset.smits1999.SMITS_1999_SPDS = CaseInsensitiveMapping({u'blue': <colour.colorimetry.spectrum.SpectralPowerDistribution object at 0x2b581f8f2c10>, u'yellow': <colour.colorimetry.spectrum.SpectralPowerDistribution object at 0x2b581f8f2a90>, u'green': <colour.colorimetry.spectrum.SpectralPowerDistribution object at 0x2b581f8f2b90>, u'cyan': <colour.colorimetry.spectrum.SpectralPowerDistribution object at 0x2b581f8f2990>, u'white': <colour.colorimetry.spectrum.SpectralPowerDistribution object at 0x2b581f8f2810>, u'magenta': <colour.colorimetry.spectrum.SpectralPowerDistribution object at 0x2b581f8f2a10>, u'red': <colour.colorimetry.spectrum.SpectralPowerDistribution object at 0x2b581f8f2b10>})¶

Smits (1999) spectral power distributions.

SMITS_1999_SPDS : CaseInsensitiveMapping
